lyrics.text: Lesson 38. Everything except the weather. First listen and then answer the question.
lyrics.translation: 第38课。除了天气什么都谈。首先听录音，然后回答问题。

lyrics.text: Why did Harrison sell his house so quickly? My old friend Harrison had lived in the Mediterranean
lyrics.translation: 为什么哈里森这么快就卖掉了他的房子？我的老朋友哈里森一直住在地中海

lyrics.text: for many years before he returned to England. He had often dreamed of retiring in England
lyrics.translation: 在他回到英格兰之前的许多年里，他经常梦想着在英格兰退休。

lyrics.text: and had planned to settle down in the country. He had no sooner returned than he bought a house
lyrics.translation: 并且计划在乡下定居。他一回来就买了一栋房子。

lyrics.text: and went to live there. Almost immediately he began to complain about the weather,
lyrics.translation: 并且搬到了那里居住。几乎一到达他就开始抱怨那里的天气，

lyrics.text: for even though it was still summer, it rained continually and it was often bitterly cold.
lyrics.translation: 尽管当时还是夏天，但是雨下个不停，而且常常冷得刺骨。

lyrics.text: After so many years of sunshine, Harrison got a shock. He acted as if he had never lived in
lyrics.translation: 经过这么多年的阳光生活，哈里森感到震惊。他表现得仿佛从未在

lyrics.text: England before. In the end, it was more than he could bear. He had hardly had time to settle down
lyrics.translation: 以前的英格兰。最终，那超出了他所能承受的范围。他几乎没有时间安顿下来

lyrics.text: when he sold the house and left the country. The dream he had had for so many years ended there.
lyrics.translation: 当他卖掉房子离开这个国家时，他多年来的梦想就此终结。

lyrics.text: Harrison has thought of everything except the weather.
lyrics.translation: 哈里森什么都想到了，唯独没想到天气。
